sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a Queen of Hearts from a standard deck of 52 playing cards?
message_2:
There is only one Queen of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 playing cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing a Queen of Hearts is 1 out of 52, which can be expressed as a fraction:

1/52 or approximately 0.0192 or 1.92% when expressed as a percentage.
